Name: Arcana Sands of Destiny
About the game: You are Jenny Hopkins a brilliant archaeologist on a magical and perilous adventure to discover the dark secrets of Egypt’s past and banish the long forgotten evil from this world forever. Your fiancé William finds a strange ancient artifact with old writings on it in Egypt. You manage to translate it and travel to Egypt. Only to find the city of Alexandria plagued with monsters and William very sick. Embark on an epic Egyptian journey to find out who's behind all of this. Make new friends along the way. Discover magical artifacts. Complete non-repetitive puzzles, mini-games and HO levels. Explore 3 Ancient Realms + Bonus Chapter More than 5 hours of Gameplay ! Over 80 locations Collect Arcana coins to build your own Palace. Choose Medieval, Arabic, Renaissance or mix them all! 32 Mini and Hidden Object games 40 Morph Objects Unlock 15 Achievements Hire Companions to help you with your quests Interactive animated characters with voiceovers Incredible music and sound effects Hint system to help you through your adventure, Casual and Normal mode Take a look at some Steam Achievements !
